Html:
Hi

I have TabPage with three pages (=tabs).
When I am on second page and press Alt + ArrowLeft, mui navigates to previous page page
but it doesn't change my viewmodel Property SelectedSource.

If I try to go back my Previous page mui doesn't navigate any more, property doesn't change.
Has anybody this kind of problems or ideas how to fix it?
Is your SelectedSource property set to a TwoWay binding?

No, my SelectedSource was without Mode parameter.
I added Mode=TwoWay parameter. Now it works perfectly.

THANKS
